thread.section_title: Chinese Laundry Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Chinese Laundry | www.chineselaundry.com | 2 of 24
thread.title: Karin

author: Karin
title: Karin
text: I have made many successful orders in the past, but the past 2 orders were sent to the wrong address. The first time it happened, I thought it must be an easy mistake, but when it happened again... even when I made special effort to ensure the correct address was entered with the order....I gave up. I emailed for assistance and was basically told, I must have made the mistake....I DIDN'T, YOU DID. So, I have certainly decided to never order from you again. I can't....you don't know where I live (apparently).
